Today I have the chance to enjoy @lucamezzalira giving a workshop about #microfrontends.  Is a pleasure hearing him talking  and sharing his experience about his journey with microfrontends.
Can we stop calling them #Microfrontends and maybe call them Micro Apps Pattern (MAP) or something.. Because in reality they are supposed to be mutually exclusive & independant Micro Apps

@FlorianRappl @bitdev_ Very interesting findings and great to see #Piral up the list inspite of being one of the newer frameworks. Also there is a need for flexibility for #microfrontends which frameworks like #reactjs and #vuejs provide.
